com.cyc.session

Interface CycAddress

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable, Serializable

    public interface CycAddress
extends Comparable, Serializable
    Describes the address of a Cyc server. This class encapsulates a Cyc server's host name, base port, and offset ports. It is easily serializable via its toString() method to a string representation as host:port.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STANDARD_ASCII_PORT_OFFSET
      Default offset for a Cyc server's ASCII port.
      static int STANDARD_CFASL_PORT_OFFSET
      Default offset for a Cyc server's binary (CFASL) port.
      static int STANDARD_HTTP_PORT_OFFSET
      Default offset for a Cyc server's Subl HTTP port.
      static int STANDARD_SERVLET_PORT_OFFSET
      Default offset for a Cyc server's Servlet port.

      • isValidString

        static boolean isValidString(String string)
        Tests whether a String could be deserialized into a valid CycAddress. The string must match the format host:port, the host must be a valid hostname or IP address, and the port must be a valid port integer. Any string which is validated by this method should be a well-formed input for fromString(String string).
        Parameters:
        string - to evaluate
        Returns:
        whether it is a valid serialized CycAddress address

      • fromString

        static CycAddress fromString(String string)
        Creates a new CycAddress instance from a string matching the format host:port.
        Parameters:
        string - a string matching the format host:port or host:port:concurrencyLevel.
        Returns:
        A new CycAddress instance based on the string representation

                              Integer concurrencyLevel)
        Creates a new CycAddress from an existing CycAddress, but with a new concurrencyLevel.
        Parameters:
        address - CycAddress from which to create the pool
        concurrencyLevel - the concurrency level for the new CycAddress
        Returns:
        A new CycAddress instance based on an existing CycAddress

      • fromAddressWithDefaults

        static CycAddress fromAddressWithDefaults(CycAddress address,
                                          Integer defaultConcurrencyLevel)
        Creates a new CycAddress from an existing CycAddress, setting the concurrency level if unspecified in the original address.
        Parameters:
        address - CycAddress from which to create the pool
        defaultConcurrencyLevel - the default concurrency level for the CycAddress, if unspecified
        Returns:
        A new CycAddress instance based on an existing CycAddress

        host name, or null if unspecified

      • getPort

        Integer getPort()
        The server's port number.
        Returns:
        port number, or null if unspecified

      • getResolvedHostName

        String getResolvedHostName()
        Returns the resolved hostname of this address. If the hostname is a loopback address (e.g. 127.0.0.1 or localhost), it will be converted to a fully-qualified domain-name. Otherwise, it will return the specified hostname as per getHostName().

        Note that this value is not used by #hashCode() or #equals(Object). Equality is based off of the explicitly-specified values.

        Returns:
        String the resolved hostname

      • getBasePort

        Integer getBasePort()
        The Cyc server's base port number.
        Returns:
        port number, or null if unspecified

      • getCfaslPort

        Integer getCfaslPort()
        The Cyc server's binary (CFASL) communications port number.
        Returns:
        port number

      • getHttpPort

        Integer getHttpPort()
        The Cyc server's SubL HTTP server port number.
        Returns:
        port number

      • getServletPort

        Integer getServletPort()
        The Cyc server's Servlet HTTP server port number.
        Returns:
        port number

      • getConcurrencyLevel

        Optional<Integer> getConcurrencyLevel()
        Number of simultaneous jobs this server can handle, if used in the server pool.
        Returns:
        Optional containing the number of simultaneous jobs, if specified

      • isDefined

        boolean isDefined()
        Checks whether the CycAddress instance contains enough information to be useful (i.e., a plausible hostname and base port).
        Returns:
        whether CycAddress is plausibly useful

      • toBaseAddress

        CycAddress toBaseAddress()
        Returns a CycAddress consisting only of the host name and base port, excluding optional fields like getConcurrencyLevel().
        Returns:

      • toResolvedAddressString

        String toResolvedAddressString()
        Returns a string representation of the server address using the resolved hostname, in the format host:port. In other words, this methods behaves like toString(), but retrieves the hostname via getResolvedHostName().
        Returns:
        a string representation of the server address, using the resolved hostname

      • toString

        String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the server address in the format host:port.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a string representation of the server address
